entry.descr: checks if at least one list element is accepted by predicate

entry.descr: outputs list element(s) at specified index(es)

entry.descr: checks if input list contains specified atoms

entry.descr: output the number of items that equal to specified value

entry.descr: output the number of items that satisfy to external predicate

entry.descr: iterate and modify list contents via side-chain

entry.descr: maps each list value via external side-chain

entry.descr: checks if given lists are equal

entry.descr: generates list of specified length via external generator

entry.name: list.insert
entry.descr: insert atom or list to the specified position of input list

entry.descr: returns the sum of the previously stored list and the current one then stores this sum

entry.name: list.length
entry.descr: output the number of atoms in the list

entry.name: list.max
entry.descr: output largest element in the list

entry.descr: calculates average of list of floats

entry.name: list.min
entry.descr: returns smallest element in the list

entry.name: list.none_of
entry.descr: checks if none of list atoms is accepted by predicate

entry.descr: leave only elements accepted by predicate

entry.name: list.product

entry.name: list.range
entry.descr: output list smallest and largest value

entry.name: list.reduce
entry.descr: apply function of two arguments cumulatively to the list

entry.descr: remove list element(s) at specified positions

entry.descr: output new list by repeating input list specified times

entry.descr: reverses the order of the elements in the list

entry.name: list.search
entry.descr: search specified items in input list

entry.name: list.separate
entry.descr: sends list elements one by one separately

entry.name: list.set
entry.descr: set list value at specified position

entry.descr: splits list to N lists, each to separate output
